text:
People are more cautious when there’s a light a the end of the tunnel, writes @CornellPsychDpt professor Thomas D. Gilovich in @latimes. Case in point, #COVID19 #vaccine: “A technological breakthrough has been met by an improvement in human behavior.”

https://t.co/hcbwAMvYaV https://t.co/eL6I2V5h8B
